name: Project Fizilion
description: A modular Telegram userbot running on Python 3.8+ with an sqlalchemy database.

STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running [python3 string_session.py] in Termux or local system.

HEROKU_MEMEZ.description: This should be True if the userbot is running on a Heroku Dyno.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your Heroku API key, get it from 'https://dashboard.heroku.com/account'

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Add the Heroku app name here. It helps with userbot updates.

GIT_REPO_NAME.description: Add the GIT_REPO_NAME here. It helps with commit on GitHub.

UPSTREAM_REPO_URL.description: In case you maintain a fork, add your repo URL here.

UPSTREAM_REPO_BRANCH.description: In case you maintain a fork, add your repo BRANCH here.

COUNTRY.description: Set your Country to be used in the .time and .date commands.

TZ_NUMBER.description: Change this value in case your country has multiple Time Zones.

CHROME_DRIVER.description: ChromeDriver location for selenium based modules.

GOOGLE_CHROME_BIN.description: Google Chrome (or) Chromium binary location for selenium based modules.

BOTLOG.description: Incase you want to turn off logging, put this to false

DEEZER_ARL_TOKEN.description: Fill of your Deezer ARL token. Get from https://notabug.org/RemixDevs/DeezloaderRemix/wiki/Login+via+userToken

BOTLOG_CHATID.description: ChatID of the Log group. Set it to '0' if BOTLOG = False and/or if LOGSPAMMER = False.

CONSOLE_LOGGER_VERBOSE.description: If you need verbosity on the console logging

PM_AUTO_BAN.description: PM Auto-Ban Feature Switch. Also known as the 'bleep blop, this is a bot...' module.

OCR_SPACE_API_KEY.description: OCR API Key for .ocr command. Get from https://ocr.space/ocrapi

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: API Key for .rbg command. Get from https://www.remove.bg/api

ANTI_SPAMBOT.description: Kicks spambots from groups after they join. [Requires admin powers in groups to kick.]

ANTI_SPAMBOT_SHOUT.description: Report spambots to @admins in groups after they join, just in case when you don't have admin powers to kick that shit yourself.

TMP_DOWNLOAD_DIRECTORY.description: Download location for many modules (GDrive, .download etc..)

USER_TERM_ALIAS.description: Set alias name of user for term bash command

CLEAN_WELCOME.description: When a new person joins, the old welcome message is deleted.

G_DRIVE_CLIENT_ID.description: Enter Your Client ID for Google Drive.

G_DRIVE_DATA.description: Enter the Google Drive authentication data, as a JSON structure.

LASTFM_API.description: API Key for Last.FM module. [Get one from - https://www.last.fm/api/account/create]

LASTFM_SECRET.description: SECRET Key for Last.FM module. [Get one from - https://www.last.fm/api/account/create]

ALIVE_LOGO.description: Show Image/Logo in .alive message. Fill value of image your link image, use telegra.ph / i.ibb.co to get your own image

TIMEOUT.description: Timeout settings for alive and help modules. Setting it to True will delete help and alive msgs after 30secs whenever the command it used.

G_DRIVE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Enter Your Client Secret for Google Drive.

G_DRIVE_FOLDER_ID.description: Enter the Google Drive Folder id where you want to upload your files.

WEATHER_DEFCITY.description: Set the default city for the userbot's weather module.

WEATHER_DEFLANG.description: Set the default language for the userbot's weather module.

LOGSPAMMER.description: Set this to True in case you want the error logs to be stored in the userbot log group, instead of spitting out the file in the current chat, requires a valid BOTLOG_CHATID to be set.
